title: Orchestrator Configuration
description: Sets up the lifecycle orchestrator as an Event Step that listens for pet creation, feeding reminders, and status change requests.

title: Transition Rules
description: Defines all valid status transitions for pets - from new to adoption, including health checks, quarantine, illness, and treatment flows.

title: Finding the Right Rule
description: Looks through all transition rules to find one that matches the current pet status and the requested change.

title: Rejecting Invalid Transitions
description: If no valid rule is found (like trying to skip quarantine), the transition is rejected with a clear reason.

title: Applying the Transition
description: Updates the pet's status in the store when a valid transition is found.

title: Transition Logging
description: Records the status change with details about what changed and why, making it easy to track pet lifecycles.

title: Automatic Progressions
description: Some status changes trigger automatic follow-up transitions - like marking a healthy pet as available for adoption without requiring staff action.

title: Error Handling
description: Catches any problems during the transition process and logs them for debugging.
